entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Report warning when Main method is updated #73472
  • Intellisense References not showing correctly when using a Primary-Constructor #73469

Closed

  • Trying to jump out of local function after a using declaration causes internal error: 'given key was not present in dictionary' #73397
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34913.43 #73460

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #73478
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Report external build errors using the platform's diagnostic brokered #73477
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename public API based on API review decision #73476
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid enumeration allocations in formatting #73475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary full tree walks in the simplifier system #73473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ref count the HubClient and ServiceBrokerClient #73467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure that when EnC finishes that it disposes the OOP connection it is holding onto #73465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement keyword recommenders for `allows ref struct` constraint #73463
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Use TextDocumentChangeRegistrationOptions for didChange registration #73462
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add runtime references to the devkit component output directory #73461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Net9 Reference Assemblies #73423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to cleaner patterns than explicit Task.Run #73471
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Properly dispose the SymbolSearchEngine #73464
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update local deployment instructions #73417
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove virtual from 'SourceMethodSymbolWithAttributes.SyntaxNode' #73433
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Stop overbuilding SemanticSearch.ReferenceAssemblies #73468
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused parts of RemoteHostClient #73466
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Recognize 'allows ref struct' constraint in VB compiler #73429
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add "First-class Span Types" feature status #73446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Test local functions with goto out of scope #73402
    Area-Compilers, Test-Gap, untriaged, Next
  • Remove array allocations for formatting rules. #73458
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: attributes #73437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field #73407
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2451076 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Add more "ref in async" tests #73444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
